attributes.action: Scrap any plans to make the maximum speed limit on country roads from 60mph to 50mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The govt are seriously considering reducing the maximum speed for driving on country roads. The govt thinks the answer to reduce road deaths is to reduce speed.

Road deaths are not always caused by speed. It is caused by not having headlights on, drink/drugs in system, poor vision from the driver, poor quality brakes, poor lane discipline and not using indicators properly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
